Recommendations: Faculty and students may be encouraged to conduct relevant collaborative researches.
Student researches may be utilized or explored for presentation in fora, publication, and/or for purposes of utilization or commercialization.
More faculty researches that focus on Cooperative Management Program may be conducted and published.
Faculty members of the program under survey maybe encouraged to conduct program-specific researches.
It is suggested that faculty and officials of the Department explore potential funding sources for relevant research projects from the local and national government agencies
